segments.text: I'm just observing this entire scene, and it's a whirlwind of unnoticed hazards.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The woman is so engrossed in her dish-drying that she's blind to everything else.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Water is everywhere, a veritable flood on the kitchen floor.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: It's honestly infuriating how oblivious she is to the mess.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Meanwhile, those children are playing a dangerous game for some cookies.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: That stool is teetering on the brink of collapse.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I can almost picture the crash of the cookies and the boy's fall.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Someone is definitely going to slip on that wet floor.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The potential for accidents here is truly alarming.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Why isn't anyone paying attention to the obvious dangers?
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: It's a ticking time bomb of domestic mishaps.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I can't help but feel a knot of tension forming in my stomach.
segments.speaker: PAR
